title: The Wedding Dress Trend You'll See Everywhere in 2017
text:
by Renee Swanberg 
Just like the rest of the fashion world, bridal fashion goes through its fair share of trends and changes every year. And it looks like one of the biggest ready-to-wear trends of 2016—the off-the-shoulder top—is crossing over into the wedding industry. BHLDN 's wedding dress buyer, Lauren Bonenberger, recently sat down with InStyle to give them the scoop on this trend and everything else bridal coming up this year. 
"We still see shoulder interest continuing in 2017 but it has also progressed into general sleeve interest," she told them. "It spans the gamut from demure cap sleeves, and flutter sleeves, to billowing boho sleeves, and long, full-coverage sleeves." So if you're looking to try something a little more forward than your basic cold-shoulder look, there are a lot of other statement sleeve options out there. We, for one, could not be more excited. 
Scroll on to shop a few of our favourite unique-sleeved gowns, and be sure to click back to read the rest of her bridal trend predictions . 1 / 5
